organises public transport in the area. There are train or bus or connections to all the destinations. Essunga, Skara and Götene have buses only, the other have trains. Search the Västtrafik site for connections.

From the Landvetter and Gothenburg City airports, the airport bus to Gothenburg (going directly from the airport building) and then Västtrafik train is preferred.

Tickets for Västtrafik can be bought by credit card onboard, but not for buses in Gothenburg. Pressbyrån (e.g. at Landvetter airport) and some other shops sell tickets. The airport bus need special tickets which are bought with credit card onboard. Read the
Inside the municipalities there are buses, all organized by Västtrafik.
